description:
Bang for the buck, this spanner is durable, comfortable and won't break the bank.

  • Made of high carbon tool steel
  • Vinyl coated handle offers a comfortble and secure grip
  • Fits adjusting cup on many adjustable type bottom brackets
  • Colour-coded for easy recognition
  • Pin diameter is 2.9mm
name: Park Tool SPA-1 Pin Tool Spanner
